text: The women's heptathlon event at the 1982 Commonwealth Games was held on 3 and 4 October at the QE II Stadium in Brisbane, Australia. It was the first time this event was held at the Commonwealth Games, replacing the pentathlon. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center" |- !Rank !Athlete !Nationality !100m
